<bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:6:3:13" default="NO">6, 3, 13</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:6:9:11" default="NO">6, 9, 11</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">necessitas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:9:12:6" default="NO"><author>id.</author> 9, 12, 6</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:2:43:3" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 2, 43, 3</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:3:4:9" default="NO" valid="yes">3, 4, 9</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Clem. 1:12:5" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Clem. 1, 12, 5</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad ultimam inopiam adducere,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:6:3:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 6, 3, 4</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:37:31:2" default="NO" valid="yes">37, 31, 2</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad ultimos casus servari,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:27:10:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 27, 10, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">dedecus,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:9:5:11" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 9, 5, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">exsecrationes,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,2806,001:24:2:8" default="NO"><author>Just.</author> 24, 2, 8</bibl></cit>: ultimum supplicium, <hi rend="ital">extreme</hi> (i. e. <hi rend="ital">capital</hi>) <hi rend="ital">punishment</hi>, <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0448,002:1:84" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Caes.</author> B. C. 1, 84</bibl>; so, <cit><quote lang="la">poena,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:3:58:10" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 3, 58, 10</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1318,001:2:11:8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> Ep. 2, 11, 8</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">desperatio,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1351,004:2:48" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Tac.</author> H. 2, 48</bibl></cit>; <bibl default="NO">2, 44</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:10:8:9" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 10, 8, 9</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:42:66:1" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 42, 66, 1</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1014,001:Contr. 4:29:2" default="NO"><author>Sen.</author> Contr. 4, 29, 2</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">discrimen ultimum vitae et regni,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:37:53:16" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 37, 53, 16</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:23:21:2" default="NO" valid="yes">23, 21, 2</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad ultimam perductus tristitiam,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Petr.</author> 24</bibl></cit>.—Esp., as <hi rend="ital">subst.</hi>: <orth extent="full" lang="la">ultĭ-ma</orth>, <itype>ōrum</itype>, <gen>n.</gen>: <cit><quote lang="la">omnia ultima pati,</quote> <trans><tr>every extremity</tr>, <tr>the worst</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:37:54:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 37, 54, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ultima pati,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,006:14:483" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Ov.</author> M. 14, 483</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0959,008:3:2:11" default="NO"><author>id.</author> Tr. 3, 2, 11</bibl>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:3:1:6" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 3, 1, 6</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">ultima audere,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:3:2:11" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 3, 2, 11</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">priusquam ultima experirentur,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:2:28:9" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 2, 28, 9</bibl></cit>.—Rarely <number>sing.</number>: <cit><quote lang="la">paene in ultimum gladiorum erupit impunitas,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1044,001:2:125:2" default="NO"><author>Vell.</author> 2, 125, 2</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad ultimum inopiae adducere,</quote> <trans><tr>to the last degree</tr>.</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:23:19:2" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 23, 19, 2</bibl></cit>; <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:31:38:1" default="NO" valid="yes">31, 38, 1</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">ad ultimum periculi pervenire,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:8:1:15" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 8, 1, 15</bibl></cit>.—<usg type="style">Trop.</usg>: <cit><quote lang="la">ut in pecude, nisi quae vis obstitit, videmus naturam suo quodam itinere ad ultimum pervenire,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0474,050:2:13:35" default="NO"><author>Cic.</author> N. D. 2, 13, 35</bibl></cit>.—Adverb.: <cit><quote lang="la">ad ultimum pro fide morituri,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0860,001:3:1:7" default="NO"><author>Curt.</author> 3, 1, 7</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">consilium sceleratum, sed non ad ultimum demens,</quote> <trans><tr>in the extreme</tr>, <tr>utterly</tr>, <tr>to the last degree</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:28:28:8" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 28, 28, 8</bibl></cit>.—</sense><sense id="n49656.18" n="b" level="4"> <hi rend="ital">The lowest</hi>, <hi rend="ital">meanest</hi> (very rare): <cit><quote lang="la">qui se Philippum regiaeque stirpis ferebat, cum esset ultimae,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,1044,001:1:11:1" default="NO"><author>Vell.</author> 1, 11, 1</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">principibus placuisse viris non ultima laus est,</quote> <bibl default="NO"><author>Hor.</author> Ep. 1, 17, 35</bibl></cit>: ultima sit laudes inter ut illa tuas, Auct. Cons. ad <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:17" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 17</bibl>: <cit><quote lang="la">ultima pistoris illa uxor,</quote> <trans><tr>the worst</tr>,</trans> <bibl default="NO"><author>App.</author> M. 9, p. 224, 26</bibl></cit>.—<hi rend="ital">Subst.</hi>: <cit><quote lang="la">ut vigiliis et labore cum ultimis militum certaret (consul),</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:34:18:5" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Liv.</author> 34, 18, 5</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">in ultimis laudum,</quote> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0914,001:30:30:4" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>id.</author> 30, 30, 4</bibl></cit>: <cit><quote lang="la">in ultimis ponere,</quote> <trans><tr>the lowest</tr>, <tr>meanest things</tr>,</trans> <bibl n="Perseus:abo:phi,0978,001:17:91" default="NO" valid="yes"><author>Plin.</author> 17, 12, 18, § 91</bibl></cit>.</sense></entryFree>
